name: Ring2Park Microservices
description: Ring2Park Online application written using Microservices approach with Docker containers

envPropDefs.name: container.links
envPropDefs.label: Container Links
envPropDefs.description: Name of any containers to link to (legacy feature)

envPropDefs.name: SERVER_PORT
envPropDefs.label: Server Port
envPropDefs.description: The port that the service will run on

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_HOST
envPropDefs.label: Eureka Hostname
envPropDefs.description: The hostname of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_PORT
envPropDefs.label: Eureka Port
envPropDefs.description: The TCP port of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE
envPropDefs.label: Eureka URI
envPropDefs.description: The full address of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: SERVER_HOST
envPropDefs.label: Server Host
envPropDefs.description: The hostname that the service will run on (used to name the container)

envPropDefs.name: primary.ip
envPropDefs.label: Server Primary IP
envPropDefs.description: Primary IP address of server (retrieved and set using get-server-ip process)

versionPropDefs.name: image.id
versionPropDefs.label: Docker Image Id
versionPropDefs.description: Docker Image Id

versionPropDefs.name: build.url
versionPropDefs.label: Build URL
versionPropDefs.description: The URL to the build in the build tool, i.e. Jenkins that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: issue.ids
versionPropDefs.label: Issue Ids
versionPropDefs.description: Comma separated list of Issue Ids, i.e. JIRA Issues that were recorded against the SCM commit

versionPropDefs.name: build.version
versionPropDefs.label: Build Version
versionPropDefs.description: Version number automatically retrieved from build tool, i.e. Maven "<project.version>"

versionPropDefs.name: build.number
versionPropDefs.label: Build Number
versionPropDefs.description: The build number in the build tool, i.e. Jenkins that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: scm.id
versionPropDefs.label: SCM Id
versionPropDefs.description: The unique id of the SCM changeset, i.e. Git commit hash that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: scm.branch
versionPropDefs.label: SCM Branch
versionPropDefs.description: The SCM branch of the commit that created the component version.

versionPropDefs.name: scm.url
versionPropDefs.label: SCM URL
versionPropDefs.description: The URL of the SCM repository of the commit that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: docker.image.id
versionPropDefs.label: Docker Image Id
versionPropDefs.description: The unique id of the docker image that was created from the component verison

processes.name: build-and-push
processes.description: Builds a docker image from a Dockerfile and pushes it to a registry

propDefs.name: dockerfile.path
propDefs.label: Dockerfile Path
propDefs.description: Path to Dockerfile to use

processes.name: build-push-and-run
processes.description: Builds a docker image from a Dockerfile, pushes it to a registry and runs it

propDefs.name: dockerfile.path
propDefs.label: Dockerfile Path
propDefs.description: Path to Dockerfile to use

propDefs.name: docker.opts
propDefs.label: Docker Options
propDefs.description: Additional Docker Options, e.g. --network=isolated_nw

propDefs.name: remove.container
propDefs.label: Remove Existing Container
propDefs.description: Remove the current version of the container

propDefs.name: pull.image
propDefs.label: Pull Image
propDefs.description: Pull the image from the registry

processes.name: create-component-version
processes.description: Create a component version for a tag from a Docker Registry

propDefs.name: image.tag
propDefs.label: Image Tag
propDefs.description: The tag of the image to create as a component version

propDefs.name: pull.image
propDefs.label: Pull Image
propDefs.description: Pull the image from the Docker Registry

processes.name: execute-command
processes.description: Executes a command in a running container

propDefs.name: docker.cmd
propDefs.label: Docker Command
propDefs.description: The command to execute in the Docker container

processes.name: get-server-ip
processes.description: Gets the primary server IP address and stores it in the application environment "primary.ip" property

propDefs.name: ip.prefix
propDefs.label: IP Prefix
propDefs.description: Prefix of IP addresses to filter

properties.scriptBody: echo address=`ifconfig | grep -Eo 'inet (addr:)?([0-9]*\.){3}[0-9]*' | grep -Eo '([0-9]*\.){3}[0-9]*' | grep -v '127.0.0.1' | grep ${ip.prefix}`

processes.name: pull-and-run
processes.description: Pull the specified Docker image version and Run it

propDefs.name: remove.container
propDefs.label: Remove Existing Container
propDefs.description: Remove the current version of the container

propDefs.name: docker.opts
propDefs.label: Docker Options
propDefs.description: Additional Docker Options, e.g. --network=isolated_nw

propDefs.name: pull.image
propDefs.label: Pull Image
propDefs.description: Pull the image from the registry

processes.name: remove-container
processes.description: Stops and removes the container

propDefs.name: stop.timeout
propDefs.label: Timeout
propDefs.description: Number of seconds to wait before killing the container

processes.name: restart-container
processes.description: Restarts the container (whether its started or not)

propDefs.name: stop.timeout
propDefs.label: Timeout
propDefs.description: The number of seconds to wait for before restarting the container

processes.name: stop-container
processes.description: Stops the container (whether its started or not)

propDefs.name: stop.timeout
propDefs.label: Timeout
propDefs.description: The number of seconds to wait before killing the container

processes.name: verify-ui
processes.description: Verify that the user interface (if any) is accessible

propDefs.name: verification.string
propDefs.label: Verification String
propDefs.description: The string to verify in the HTML web page, e.g. title

propDefs.name: verification.wait
propDefs.label: Verification Wait Time
propDefs.description: Maximum wait time (in seconds) to wait for verification string

envPropDefs.label: Container Links
envPropDefs.description: Name of any containers to link to (legacy feature)

envPropDefs.name: SERVER_PORT
envPropDefs.label: Server Port
envPropDefs.description: The port that the service will run on

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_HOST
envPropDefs.label: Eureka Hostname
envPropDefs.description: The hostname of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_PORT
envPropDefs.label: Eureka Port
envPropDefs.description: The TCP port of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE
envPropDefs.label: Eureka URI
envPropDefs.description: The full address of the (Eureka) registration and discovery server

envPropDefs.name: SERVER_HOST
envPropDefs.label: Server Host
envPropDefs.description: The hostname that the service will run on (used to name the container)

envPropDefs.name: primary.ip
envPropDefs.label: Server Primary IP
envPropDefs.description: Primary IP address of server (retrieved and set using get-server-ip process)

versionPropDefs.name: image.id
versionPropDefs.label: Docker Image Id
versionPropDefs.description: Docker Image Id

versionPropDefs.name: build.url
versionPropDefs.label: Build URL
versionPropDefs.description: The URL to the build in the build tool, i.e. Jenkins that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: issue.ids
versionPropDefs.label: Issue Ids
versionPropDefs.description: Comma separated list of Issue Ids, i.e. JIRA Issues that were recorded against the SCM commit

versionPropDefs.name: build.version
versionPropDefs.label: Build Version
versionPropDefs.description: Version number automatically retrieved from build tool, i.e. Maven "<project.version>"

versionPropDefs.name: build.number
versionPropDefs.label: Build Number
versionPropDefs.description: The build number in the build tool, i.e. Jenkins that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: scm.id
versionPropDefs.label: SCM Id
versionPropDefs.description: The unique id of the SCM changeset, i.e. Git commit hash that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: scm.branch
versionPropDefs.label: SCM Branch
versionPropDefs.description: The SCM branch of the commit that created the component version.

versionPropDefs.name: scm.url
versionPropDefs.label: SCM URL
versionPropDefs.description: The URL of the SCM repository of the commit that created the component version

versionPropDefs.name: docker.image.id
versionPropDefs.label: Docker Image Id
versionPropDefs.description: The unique id of the docker image that was created from the component verison
